meanings.definition: A dining establishment where customers serve themselves from a variety of food options.
meanings.sent1: In some cafeterias, you can choose from salads, sandwiches, and hot meals.
meanings.sent2: During lunchtime, the students line up in the cafeterias to get their food.
meanings.sent3: The cafeteria food was so delicious that everyone wanted seconds!
meanings.sent4: The cafeteria buzzed with activity as people made their food selections.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh food wafted through the cafeteria, enticing hungry customers.

meanings.definition: The area within a school or workplace where meals are served.
meanings.sent1: Students gathered in the school cafeteria to eat their lunches.
meanings.sent2: The cafeteria in the office building was always busy during lunch hours.
meanings.sent3: During the meeting, the boss joked about having a desk in the cafeteria.
meanings.sent4: The cafeteria of ideas was where creativity flourished in the company.
meanings.sent5: The cafeteria was a hub of social interaction and shared meals in the workplace.
